>
[Medusa Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=603)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 91</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 3
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+2 [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=139) [scale mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=8)_ appears to have a [_fortification_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=285) rune but grants none of its effects. Whenever you are critically hit, after taking damage, you become [petrified](/Conditions.aspx?ID=30) for 1 round. Once the curse has activated for the first time, the armor fuses to you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
